name: Orlombus
text: Activate: Main [Once Per Turn] Reduce the cost of up to 1 of your opponent's Characters by -4 during this turn, and trash the top 2 cards of your deck. Then, K.O. 1 of your "Dressrosa" type Characters.

effect.text: Reduce the cost of up to 1 of your opponent's Characters by -4 during this turn, and trash the top 2 cards of your deck. Then, K.O. 1 of your "Dressrosa" type Characters.

meta.notes: Rarity 'C' confirmed from the bottom right corner of the card.
